  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class HtmlWriter
extends XMLWriter
implements Contexed, XMLContentBuilder
    A streaming version of the XMLContentBuilder

    • Method Detail

      • getText

        public ExtendedXMLBuilder getText()
        Description copied from interface: ContentBuilder
        create a ExtendedXMLBuilder that appends its contents as XML text when the SimpleXMLBuilder.appendParent() method is called. Normally this represents a separate paragraph of text but this can be mapped onto ContentBuilder.getSpan() where this does not make sense for example where the ContentBuilder represents a heading or table cell.
        Specified by:
        getText in interface ContentBuilder
        Returns:
        ExtendedXMLBuilder

      • getSpan

        public ExtendedXMLBuilder getSpan()
        Description copied from interface: ContentBuilder
        create a ExtendedXMLBuilder that appends its contents as XML text when the SimpleXMLBuilder.appendParent() method is called. This is intended for in-line text rather than creating a paragraph.
        Specified by:
        getSpan in interface ContentBuilder
        Returns:
        ExtendedXMLBuilder

      • getHeading

        public ContentBuilder getHeading(int level)
        Description copied from interface: ContentBuilder
        create a ContentBuilder that appends its contents as a heading when the ContentBuilder.addParent() method is called. If the heading is to only contain text use the ContentBuilder.addHeading(int, String) method.
        Specified by:
        getHeading in interface ContentBuilder
        Parameters:
        level - level of heading
        Returns:
        ContentBuilder for header
